Monologue.Current: Администратор{Line}“Добро пожаловать в самый{Line} прекрасный отель Баламба.”
Monologue.Original: Receptionist{Line}“Welcome to the{Line} lovely Balamb Hotel.”

Monologue.Current: “Комнаты по 100 гилей.{Line} Вы хотите остановиться у нас?{Line}Да{Line}Нет
Monologue.Original: “Rooms are 100 Gil.{Line} Will you be staying with us?”{Line}Yes{Line}No

Monologue.Current: Администратор{Line}“Но... у вас недостаточно денег...”
Monologue.Original: Receptionist{Line}“But...{Line} You don’t seem to have enough money...”

Monologue.Current: Bell Boy{Line}“Please let me know{Line} if you need anything.”
Monologue.Original: Bell Boy{Line}“Please let me know{Line} if you need anything.”

Monologue.Current: “Здорово! Этот городок{Line} чертовски хорошо!”
Monologue.Original: “Hello there, chap.{Line} This is one hell of a town.”

Monologue.Current: “Было бы здорово обосноваться{Line} здесь после ухода на пенсию...”
Monologue.Original: “This would be a great town to live in{Line} when you retire, don’t you think?”

Monologue.Current: “Может, жена перестала бы{Line} ворчать, поживи она здесь{Line} несколько лет...”
Monologue.Original: “Maybe my wife would cut back{Line} on her yapitty-yap complainin’{Line} if she lived here.”

Monologue.Current: Администратор{Line}“Это гости из Гальбадии.”
Monologue.Original: Receptionist{Line}“These guests are from {Term Galbadia}.”

Monologue.Current: “Как интересно...{Line} Похоже, в отличии от нашего{Line} захолустья, там жизнь бьёт ключём!”
Monologue.Original: “How interesting.{Line} So, unlike in this hick town here,{Line} you can get your hands on the latest fads.”

Monologue.Current: Администратор{Line}“Ой, простите,{Line} я слегка увлеклась.”
Monologue.Original: Receptionist{Line}“Oops... I’m sorry.{Line} I just got so caught up in my story.”

Monologue.Current: “You know what? I like you.{Line} Next time, I’ll bring you a gift.”
Monologue.Original: “You know what? I like you.{Line} Next time, I’ll bring you a gift.”

Monologue.Current: “Hehe...{Line} Hope to see you again.”
Monologue.Original: “Hehe...{Line} Hope to see you again.”

Monologue.Current: “Please bring your wife{Line} next time you visit.”
Monologue.Original: “Please bring your wife{Line} next time you visit.”

Monologue.Current: “I’m sure she’ll enjoy this town{Line} as much as you have, sir.”
Monologue.Original: “I’m sure she’ll enjoy this town{Line} as much as you have, sir.”

Monologue.Current: “I hope so.{Line} She lives for being thrifty...”
Monologue.Original: “I hope so.{Line} She lives for being thrifty...”

Monologue.Current: “And I live for spending.{Line} I wish I could spend a lot on you.”
Monologue.Original: “And I live for spending.{Line} I wish I could spend a lot on you.”

Monologue.Current: “Прости, но я проиграл{Line} местным все свои карты.”
Monologue.Original: “Oh, cards.{Line} I lost most of mine{Line} to the host here.”

Monologue.Current: “Настоящие шуллеры, скажу я тебе!”
Monologue.Original: “Excellent player, I must say!”

Monologue.Current: “W-Wait, {Char Squall}!{Line} Look at that...”
Monologue.Original: “W-Wait, {Char Squall}!{Line} Look at that...”

Monologue.Current: “H...Hold up a sec, {Char Squall}!{Line} Check that out...”
Monologue.Original: “H...Hold up a sec, {Char Squall}!{Line} Check that out...”

Monologue.Current: Library Girl with a Pigtail{Line}“Zell, I really wanted you to read this.{Line} I’m glad I found you here...”
Monologue.Original: Library Girl with a Pigtail{Line}“Zell, I really wanted you to read this.{Line} I’m glad I found you here...”

Monologue.Current: Library Girl with a Pigtail{Line}“Ze... I real...ed...you...rea...is.{Line} I’m...gl...I...ound...re...”
Monologue.Original: Library Girl with a Pigtail{Line}“Ze... I real...ed...you...rea...is.{Line} I’m...gl...I...ound...re...”

Monologue.Current: Zell{Line}“Well, like...um...hmm...{Line} I’m not the kind to read books and I don’t{Line} really like sittin’ around all quiet, either...”
Monologue.Original: Zell{Line}“Well, like...um...hmm...{Line} I’m not the kind to read books and I don’t{Line} really like sittin’ around all quiet, either...”

Monologue.Current: Zell{Line}“...ke...um...mm...{Line} I...ot...ki...re...oks...n’t{Line} ...lly...ke...in’...ar...qui...ther...”
Monologue.Original: Zell{Line}“...ke...um...mm...{Line} I...ot...ki...re...oks...n’t{Line} ...lly...ke...in’...ar...qui...ther...”

Monologue.Current: Library Girl with a Pigtail{Line}“Haha...{Line} I know.{Line} That’s why I picked out this book...”
Monologue.Original: Library Girl with a Pigtail{Line}“Haha...{Line} I know.{Line} That’s why I picked out this book...”

Monologue.Current: Library Girl with a Pigtail{Line}“Haha...{Line} I...ow.{Line} Tha...hy...cked...ou...th...ook...”
Monologue.Original: Library Girl with a Pigtail{Line}“Haha...{Line} I...ow.{Line} Tha...hy...cked...ou...th...ook...”

Monologue.Current: Zell{Line}“ALRIGHT!!!”
Monologue.Original: Zell{Line}“ALRIGHT!!!”

Monologue.Current: Library Girl with a Pigtail{Line}“Each time...well even just{Line} sometimes when you read this book...”
Monologue.Original: Library Girl with a Pigtail{Line}“Each time...well even just{Line} sometimes when you read this book...”

Monologue.Current: Library Girl with a Pigtail{Line}“Ea...ime...ell...time...en{Line} you...ead...ook...”
Monologue.Original: Library Girl with a Pigtail{Line}“Ea...ime...ell...time...en{Line} you...ead...ook...”

Monologue.Current: “Please think of me.{Line} Even if it’s just a little...”
Monologue.Original: “Please think of me.{Line} Even if it’s just a little...”

Monologue.Current: “...ease...ink...me.{Line} ...ven...t’s...st...ttle...”
Monologue.Original: “...ease...ink...me.{Line} ...ven...t’s...st...ttle...”

Monologue.Current: “That would be enough{Line} ...to fill my heart...”
Monologue.Original: “That would be enough{Line} ...to fill my heart...”

Monologue.Current: “...ould...ough{Line} ...fill...eart...”
Monologue.Original: “...ould...ough{Line} ...fill...eart...”

Monologue.Current: Zell{Line}“......”
Monologue.Original: Zell{Line}“......”

Monologue.Current: Library Girl with a Pigtail{Line}“I...I’m sorry!{Line} I just had to tell you!”
Monologue.Original: Library Girl with a Pigtail{Line}“I...I’m sorry!{Line} I just had to tell you!”

Monologue.Current: Library Girl with a Pigtail{Line}“...sorry...!{Line} ...had...ell...you!”
Monologue.Original: Library Girl with a Pigtail{Line}“...sorry...!{Line} ...had...ell...you!”

Monologue.Current: “Please take care of yourself!”
Monologue.Original: “Please take care of yourself!”

Monologue.Current: “...ake...self!”
Monologue.Original: “...ake...self!”

Monologue.Current: “Y-Yo, {Char Squall}!{Line} I was waitin’ for ya! Let’s go!”
Monologue.Original: “Y-Yo, {Char Squall}!{Line} I was waitin’ for ya! Let’s go!”

Monologue.Original: Received [Combat King 003]!
